author: atm
msg: HDFS-4473. Don't create domain socket unless we need it. Contributed by Colin Patrick McCabe.

author: rhuijben
msg: Separate the setup of the deeptree tests from the actions file in the test
suite. This cleans up the code and avoids loading 1000 lines of python on
almost every test invocation when running tests parallel.
Remove all deeptrees code. Copy Item abbreviation as that is being used
Copied from actions.py. Remove actions.py code, but import everything from

author: julianfoad
msg: Remove the support in the test suite's ExpectedOutput class for ignoring
lines that match a regular expression.
The support is rather limited (and, I think, actually broken in the general
case), and it is getting in the way of generalizing the matcher classes.
This was added in r998644 for an svnrdump test, and that is still the only
user, so make that test ignore those lines itself.
(run_dump_test): Remove the lines that we don't expect to match, instead
of asking compare_and_display_lines() to do so.
(ExpectedOutput, UnorderedOutput): Remove the matches_except() methods and
the 'except_re' parameter to the matches() method.
